CustomField.description: Used to search for Accounts in the same region, so a TSR can be appointed to a ROOFPRO Account/Applicant from that region. Field set as External ID as this is the only way for flow to search Accounts without throwing errors. (Flow: IKO ROOFPRO Matching TSRs). This field is populated with an Account Workflow field update.
CustomField.label: Trimmed Postal Code
